sourcesContent:
<script>
export default {
  name: "ToolBar",
  data () {
    return {
      dialog: false,
      items: [
        {
          icon: 'home',
          text: 'Home',
          routerLink: 'Home'
        },
        {
          icon: 'info',
          text: 'About',
          routerLink: 'About'
        },
        {
          icon: 'assignment_turned_in',
          text: 'Menu',
          routerLink: 'Menu'
        },
        {
          icon: 'email',
          text: 'Ordina',
          routerLink: 'Order'
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
</script>


<template>
  <v-card
      flat
      height="48px"
      tile
    >
      <v-toolbar
        dense
        color="primary"
        class="hidden-sm-and-down golden-color"
      >
        <v-img
          src="../assets/logo_taurus_transparent.png"
          max-height="40px"
          max-width="40px"
        ></v-img>
        <v-toolbar-title class="pl-4">Pizzeria Taurus</v-toolbar-title>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <v-toolbar-items>
          <v-btn
            v-for="item in items"
            v-bind:key="item.text"
            class="golden-color"
            text
            small
          >
            {{ item.text }}
          </v-btn>
        </v-toolbar-items>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <v-btn
          small
          depressed
          color="secondary"
          class="ml-4 pa-2"
        >
          Sign up
        </v-btn>
        <v-btn
          small
          depressed
          color="secondary"
          class="ml-4 pa-2"
        >
          Log in
        </v-btn>

      </v-toolbar>

    <v-toolbar
        dense
        color="primary"
        class="hidden-md-and-up golden-color"
      >
        <v-img
          src="../assets/logo_taurus_transparent.png"
          max-height="40px"
          max-width="40px"
        ></v-img>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <v-btn
          small
          depressed
          color="secondary"
          class="mx-2 pa-2"
        >
          Sign up
        </v-btn>
        <v-btn
          small
          depressed
          color="secondary"
          class="mx-2 pa-2"
        >
          Log in
        </v-btn>

      <v-dialog
        v-model="dialog"
        fullscreen
        hide-overlay
        transition="dialog-top-transition"
      >
        <template dark v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
          <v-btn
            icon
            color="secondary"
            v-bind="attrs"
            v-on="on"
          >
            <v-icon>mdi-</v-icon>
          </v-btn>
        </template>
        <v-card>
          <v-toolbar flat color="secondary">
            <v-toolbar-title>Mobile Menu</v-toolbar-title>
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            <v-btn icon v-on:click="dialog = false">
              <v-icon>close</v-icon>
            </v-btn>
          </v-toolbar>

          <v-list>
            <v-list-tile
              v-for="(item, index) in items"
              v-bind:key="index"
              to="#"
            >
              <v-list-tile-action>
                <v-icon v-if="item.icon">{{item.icon}}</v-icon>
              </v-list-tile-action>
              <v-list-tile-content>
                <v-list-tile-title :title="item.title">{{ item.text }}</v-list-tile-title>
              </v-list-tile-content>
            </v-list-tile>
          </v-list>
        </v-card>
      </v-dialog>

      </v-toolbar>
    </v-card>
</template>


<style scoped>

.golden-color {
  color: #DDB752 !important;
}

</style>
